articles.title: At least 15 dead , 19 injured in Guatemala as bus plunges into ravine
articles.summary: News | Transport At least 15 dead, 19 injured in Guatemala as bus plunges into ravine The bus, which was travelling between Guatemala City and San Marcos, crashed for unknown reasons, authorities say. Members of the Public Prosecutor's Office work near the bodies of victims of a road accident at Cumbre de Alaska in Totonicapan, Guatemala [Gustavo Rodas/AFP] By News Agencies Published On 27 Dec 2025 27 Dec 2025 Click here to share on social media
